title: Ford Sync [IAB-5114]: Verify that the Lockscreen doesn't disappear when playing Highlights and connecting a device to Ford Sync
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a screen that contains Highlights
AND we start up a Highlight
AND we connect our device to Ford Sync
AND the Highlight finishes
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Application is still locked
AND that the Ford Sync screen is still up

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5115]: Verify that if we start an MLB.TV feed and then connect to Ford Sync that the MLB.TV feed shuts down correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we connect to Ford Sync
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that the MLB.TV Stream will stop
AND that the Ford Sync Stream that we've select will play

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5242]: Verify that we can enable / disable Ford Sync through the configuration file
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed At Bat
custom_steps:
WHEN we adjust the configuration file value of "shouldDisableSync" to "1"
OR we adjust the configuration file value of "shouldDisableSync" to "0"
AND we have launched the Application
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that Ford Sync is either appropriately disabled
OR that Ford Sync is appropriately enabled

title: [IAB-5271] iPhone Gameday Wrap: Change Final Score Header Format
custom_preconds: Given a game has gone into the Final state
custom_steps:
When the user taps on Gameday
And is in the Wrap tab
custom_expected: Then the teams at the top of the page will be arranged by <winner/score>, <loser/score> format

title: Scenario [IAB-5202]: Verify that if there is only one button on the Paywall that it is always centered properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we remove a Product SKU from the config for a Paywall that has two buttons
custom_steps: WHEN we pull up that particular paywall
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the button is properly centered on the Paywall

title: Live Look In [IAB-5232]: Verify that the "Live Look In" button doesn't disappear from the Scoreboard if we enter a Team Page followed by returning to the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Favorite Team set
AND there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Favorite Team tab
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item to open up the Team Selector
AND we tap on any Team
AND we navigate back to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that the Live Look In is still available on the top
AND that the Live Look In is still available in the Game Drawer for the particular game

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-5297]: Verify that if we tap on the Team Selector that the header label reads as "Filter"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on the "Highlights" tab
AND we tap on the Team Selector
custom_expected: THEN the header will read as "Filter"

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-5036]: Verify that the keyboard is dismissed when scrolling through a Team Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on "News"
AND we tap on "Highlights"
AND we tap on the "Team Selector"
AND we tap on a "Team"
AND we tap on the "Search Field" to bring the Keyboard up
AND we attempt to scroll down the "Team Roster"
custom_expected: THEN the keyboard will automatically dismiss itself

title: MLB.TV [IAB-5298]: Verify that the MLB.TV menu item is actually labeled as ".TV" now
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Tab Bar
OR we look at the More Menu
custom_expected: THEN we will see that MLB.TV is showing up as ".TV" instead of "Videos" or "MLB.TV".

title: MLB.TV [IAB-5308]: Verify that if we access MLB.TV from the Tab Bar or Menu for Multi-Angle Streams that we do NOT see a "Done" button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Multi-Angle TV Stream available
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to MLB.TV / Videos
AND we tap on a Multi-ANgle TV Stream
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see a "Done" button in the top right corner

title: News [IAB-5216]: Verify that if we tap on the first article that we can't tap on the "Up" arrow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "News"
AND we tap on the first article
custom_expected: THEN we will not be able to tap on the "Up" arrow

title: News [IAB-5216]: Verify that if we tap on the last article that we can't tap on the "Down" arrow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "News"
AND we tap on the last article
custom_expected: THEN we will not be able to tap on the "Down" arrow

title: News [IAB-5221]: Verify that the ability to pull up the "Swipe Delete" on the Team Selector is no longer available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "News"
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item to open up the Team Selector
AND we attempt to swipe from left to right on the Favorite Team
custom_expected:
THEN we will not see anything occur
AND we will not see any mention of the word "Delete"

title: News [IAB-5256]: Verify that if we switch between different Filters in the Team Selector that the currently selected filter is highlighted when we go back in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item to open up the Team Selector
AND we tap on a random item in here
AND we tap no the MLB.com menu item to open up the Team Selector again
custom_expected: THEN we will notice that the currently selected Filter is appropriately highlighted

title: News [IAB-5297]: Verify that if we tap on the Team Selector that the header label reads as "Filter"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on the Team Selector
custom_expected: THEN the header will read as "Filter"

title: Postseason [IAB-5251]: Verify that the Postseason Series selector buttons look crisp against Retina
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing a Retina Based Device
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look at the Postseason Series selector
AND we select each series
custom_expected: THEN the images being displayed on the selector are crisp

title: Postseason [IAB-5251]: Verify that the Postseason Series selector doesn't look blurry on non-Retina
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing a non-Retina Based Device
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look at the Postseason Series selector
AND we select each series
custom_expected: THEN the images being displayed on the selector will NOT be blurry

title: Postseason [IAB-5253]: Verify that the Table Height is the same for the Division Series and League Championship Series
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are currently in Postseason Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we tap on the Series Selector
AND we select the Division Series
AND we tap on the Series Selector
AND we select the League Championship Series
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the height between the two series will be the same

title: Postseason [IAB-5255]: Verify that the currently selected series in the Series selector is a different color then the rest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we note the currently selected series at the top
AND we tap on the Series selector
AND we switch between each Series
custom_expected: THEN we will note that each series is properly highlighted in the Series selector when it has been selected

title: Postseason [IAB-5258]: Verify that "if necessary" games will show up with an asterisk and have a darker font color then non "if necessary" games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is currently enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look through the various series
AND there are some "if necessary" games available
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the "if necessary" games have asterisks next to them
AND we will see that the "if necessary" games have a darker font color compared to games that are required

title: Postseason [IAB-5260]: Verify that the number of games for each series are correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled Postseason mode
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we move through each Series in the Series selector
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each series has the correct number of games

title: Postseason [IAB-5261]: Verify that the Game Number Label is not missing from any game in any series
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we switch between Series
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each series has all of it's games labels

title: Postseason [IAB-5262]: Verify that if we tap on a game in the Postseason view as a Lite User that we are brought to the Box Score of that game by default
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we tap on a game that is in the state of "In Progress"
OR we tap on a game that is in the state of "Finalized"
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the "Box Score" for that particular game

title: Postseason [IAB-5263]: Verify that the Postseason Cell on the Teams page is showing the Retina graphic on Retina Devices
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we navigate to Teams
AND we navigate to a Team
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Postseason Cell on this page is utilizing the correct Retina graphic

title: Postseason [IAB-5268]: Verify that the Postseason Tab is configurable to where it will not show for users that aren't utilizing at least 5.5
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have a device installed with a version lower then 5.5
AND we have another device installed with a version of 5.5 and/or greater
AND we have launched the Application on both
custom_steps: WHEN we take a look at the Tab Bar on the bottom
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Postseason tab will not appear for users under version 5.5
AND we will see that the Postseason tab will appear for users running at least 5.5

title: Postseason [IAB-5276]: Verify that any game that has a time of 3:33 AM will show as "TBD" instead of as 3:33 AM
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is currently enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look through the various series
custom_expected: THEN we will see anytime that is currently set to 3:33 AM displayed as "TBD"

title: Postseason [IAB-5282]: Verify that the Game Cell information will not overlap each other for a Post Season series on the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a day with postseason games available
AND we expand the game drawer of one of the cells
custom_expected: THEN we will see that none of the information is overlapped

title: Postseason [IAB-5282]: Verify that the Game Cell information will not overlap each other for a Post Season series on a Team Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Teams Page that is in the playoffs
AND we navigate to a day with postseason games available
AND we take a look at the game drawer
custom_expected: THEN we will see that none of the information is overlapped

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are utilizing an iPhone 3GS
AND we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Postseason Tab
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Postseason Series picker is properly sized

AND we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled

AND we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled

custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Postseason Series picker is properly sized

title: Postseason [IAB-5285]: Verify that when we tap on a Series Selector in News that we will see that the labels under the Series Selector are correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on the Team Selector
AND we tap on a Series Selector
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the "Back" button reads as "Filter"
AND we will see that the Header Label reflects as "<Series Name> Matchups"

title: Postseason [IAB-5286]: Verify that the Series text Label is not cut off on iOS 4
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are utilizing an iOS 4 Based device
AND we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look through the various series
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Series text is not cutoff anywhere

title: Postseason [IAB-5287]: Verify that the series text for Wild Card games is along the line of "Game begins" instead of "Series begins"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we switch the series to "Wild Card"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see if it's the day of the game that the text will read as "Game begins today"
AND we will see if the game is under two days away that the text will read as "Game begins <Date Info>"

title: Postseason [IAB-5289]: Verify that the Date & Time Format for Wild Card games is correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we switch to the Wild Card series
custom_expected:
THEN we will see on the day of the game that the game cell reads with the Time Properly
AND we will see that the second line under the Time doesn't contain any erroneous information

title: Postseason [IAB-5290]: Verify that the Base Indicator isn't cut off at all in the Postseason View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason View
AND we have a game in progress available
AND we have a player on base
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that the Base Indicator looks good
AND that the Base Indicator is not cutoff at all

title: Postseason [IAB-5296]: Ensure that the Tab Set between Lite and Non-Lite users remains consistent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
AND we switch over to a Premium User
custom_expected: THEN we will notice that the Tab Bar set is utilizing the same layout with the same menus in either mode

title: Postseason [IAB-5302]: Verify that we can set the default series on the Postseason View to each Series successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application

QA URL: http://qa.mlb.com/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml
custom_steps:
WHEN we change the <defaultSeriesId> to each series
AND we set the <defaultGameId> to a game that exists for a particular series
AND we do this for each series
AND we close down our Application between each of these changes
AND we reopen our Application
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to see that each series that we set will open up as default successfully

title: Postseason [IAB-5304]: Verify that if we tap on a game from the Postseason View that the "Back" button is labeled as "Postseason"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we tap on a game
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Back" button is labeled as "Postseason"

title: Postseason [IAB-5311]: Verify that we can successfully change the order of the games under each series
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled

QA URL: http://qa.mlb.com/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we change the <position> variable for games for a particular series in the configuration file
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the games for that particular series now reflect in the order of the <position> variable that has been set in the configuration files

title: Postseason [IAB-5318]: Verify that the first time a user accesses the Postseason View that the Series popover is automatically opened
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Postseason View for the first time
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Series popover is automatically open

title: Postseason [IAB-5319]: Verify that the TV Station Logo's will only update when the image file is modified
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason view
AND we see the TV various TV logos present
AND we have an iOS Developer (i.e. like Alex Corrigan) upload a different logo for a TV  Station
AND we leave the postseason view
AND we come back to the postseason view
custom_expected: THEN we will see the new logo that has been uploaded

title: Postseason [IAB-5337]: Verify that if we tap on the Free Trial Banner on the Postseason View that the Accessibility Label will be read correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Postseason View
AND we tap on the Free Trial Banner
custom_expected: THEN the Accessibility Label will be read correctly

title: Postseason [IAB-5337]: Verify that if we double tap on the Free Trial Banner with Accessibility enabled on the Postseason View that the Trial Flow will open up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Postseason View
AND we double tap on the Free Trial Banner
custom_expected: THEN the Free Trial flow will successfully open up

title: Settings [IAB-4734]: Verify that the Tab Bar icons remain consistent upon testing the backgrounding of the Application for an hour
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we don't have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we select a 'Team'
AND we background the application
AND we move the device time up at least an hour
AND we return to the Application
AND we tap on 'Video Highlights'
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT notice any weirdness with the Tab Bar icons

title: Settings (In-App Notifications) [IAB-4984]: Verify that In-App Notifications display appropriately on the Audio Controller
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Notifications enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Audio Controller
AND we receive an In-App Notification
custom_expected: THEN we will successfully be able to see the In-App Notification inside of the Audio UI

title: Settings (In-App Notifications) [IAB-4984]: Verify that In-App Notifications display appropriately on the Paywall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Notifications enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Paywall
AND we receive an In-App Notification
custom_expected: THEN we will successfully be able to see the In-App Notification appear on the Paywall screen

title: Settings (In-App Notifications) [IAB-5275]: Verify that after installing the Application when we enter "News" that we see a Notification mentioning "Video Highlights" moving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to News
custom_expected: THEN we will see a notification of "Video Highlights are now found in the News section." which will auto dismiss when we tap anywhere on the screen

title: Settings (In-App Notifications) [IAB-5275]: Verify that after installing the Application when we enter "Videos" that we see a Notification mentioning "Video Highlights" moving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on Videos
custom_expected: THEN we will see a message of "Video highlights are now found in the News section." appear that will auto-dismiss when we tap anywhere on the screen

title: Settings (In-App Notifications) [IAB-5306]: Verify that if we have just set our "Favorite Team" and we tap on the team under the Tab Bar that we see the appropriate Notification message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have just set a Favorite Team
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Team on the Tab Bar
custom_expected: THEN we will see an In-App Notification message of "You can change teams at anytime with the MLB.com button."

title: Settings (Alerts) [IAB-5273]: Verify that an Alert is able to open up an Internal Webview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have freshly installed our application
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we see the Paywall
AND we log in as a Full User
AND we receive an "Alert"
AND we tap on the "Learn More" button
custom_expected: THEN we will see that an Internal Webview will open up from the Alert

title: Trial [IAB-5269]: Verify that if tap "Register" on the "Free Trial" page when the Login / Register screen opens that we see the correct disclaimer above the Login / Register button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Free Trial
AND we tap on "Register" on the webview
custom_expected: THEN on the "Login" tab as well as the "Register" tab we will see the text of "Trial participants may receive email about MLB.com products." being displayed

title: Trial [IAB-5186]: Verify that if we are a Lite user that we will see a thin "Sponsor Ad Banner" that will open up the "Ford Free App Trial" flow on the Postseason View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Postseason View
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a thin banner under the series selector 
AND the thin banner will be above the first series being displayed
AND the thin banner will be displaying the image located at the config value of: postseasonOfferImageUrl

title: Trial [IAB-5186]: Verify that we will see a thin "Sponsor Ad Banner" after we have signed up for the "Ford Free App Trial" this will differ from the original thin bar image that was there for the Postseason
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason View
AND we have logged into an account that has been signed up to the "Ford Free App Trial"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a Thin Ad Banner that will differ from the original Thin Ad Banner image and will match the config value of 'postseasonImageUrl' instead
AND we will see if we tap on it that it will open up an internal webview

title: Team [IAB-5120]: Verify that if we put a team id into the "forceOffseasonModeForTeams" array in the config that that particular team will be forced to offseason mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application

Example URL: http://wapqa.mlb.com/atbat/config/5.5.0

Example Setting: "forceOffseasonModeForTeams":["121","146"]
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Team page
AND we see that it's not in offseason mode
AND we have that team_id entered into the array of 'forceOffseasonModeForTeams' inside of the normal config file
AND we restart our Application
AND we navigate back to the Team page
custom_expected: THEN we will see that particular Team will be forced to offseason mode

title: Team [IAB-5215]: Verify that if we "Lose Connectivity" before entering "News" that we will see a "Could not load data" retry button when entering
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a single Team
AND we switch our device into Airplane Mode
AND we tap on News
custom_expected: THEN we will see that there is a "Could not load data" retry button available to us

title: Team [IAB-5215]: Verify that if we "Lose Connectivity" before entering "Video Highlights" that we will see a "Could not load data" retry button when entering
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a single Team
AND we switch our device into Airplane Mode
AND we tap on Video Highlights
custom_expected: THEN we will see that there is a "Could not load data" retry button available to us

title: Team [IAB-5220]: Verify that the ability to pull up the "Swipe Delete" on the Team Selector is no longer available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have added a Favorite Team
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "Team Selector" on the Favorite Team page
AND we swipe from left to right on the "Favorite Team"
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that nothing occurs
AND we will not see any mention of "Delete"

title: Team [IAB-5256]: Verify if we have a Favorite Team set that if we tap on different teams in the Team Selector that when we go back to the Team Selector that they are properly highlighted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Team tab
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item to open up the Team Selector
AND we tap on a random item in here
AND we tap no the MLB.com menu item to open up the Team Selector again
custom_expected: THEN we will notice that the currently selected Filter is appropriately highlighted

title: Team [IAB-5297]: Verify that if we access Teams from More or from the Favorite Team selector that it states "Teams" as the header label
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "More"
AND we tap on "Teams"
OR we have a Favorite Team set
AND we tap on the "Team Selector"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the header reads as "Teams"

title: Team News [IAB-5216]: Verify that if we tap on the first article that we can't tap on the "Up" arrow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Team
AND we tap on the "News" menu item
AND we tap on the last article
custom_expected: THEN we will not be able to tap the "Down" arrow

title: Team News [IAB-5216]: Verify that if we tap on the last article that we can't tap on the "Down" arrow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Team
AND we tap on the "News" menu item
AND we tap on the last article
custom_expected: THEN we will not be able to tap the "Down" arrow

title: Team Schedule (List) [IAB-5090]: Verify that the transition to the List view looks smooth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Team page
AND we tap on the 'Schedule' button
AND we tap on the 'List' tab
custom_expected: THEN we will see the screen smoothly transition to the 'List' tab

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5114]: Verify that the Lockscreen doesn't disappear when playing Highlights and connecting a device to Ford Sync
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a screen that contains Highlights
AND we start up a Highlight
AND we connect our device to Ford Sync
AND the Highlight finishes
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Application is still locked
AND that the Ford Sync screen is still up

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5115]: Verify that if we start an MLB.TV feed and then connect to Ford Sync that the MLB.TV feed shuts down correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we connect to Ford Sync
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that the MLB.TV Stream will stop
AND that the Ford Sync Stream that we've select will play

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5242]: Verify that we can enable / disable Ford Sync through the configuration file
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed At Bat
custom_steps:
WHEN we adjust the configuration file value of "shouldDisableSync" to "1"
OR we adjust the configuration file value of "shouldDisableSync" to "0"
AND we have launched the Application
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that Ford Sync is either appropriately disabled
OR that Ford Sync is appropriately enabled

title: Scenario [IAB-5202]: Verify that if there is only one button on the Paywall that it is always centered properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we remove a Product SKU from the config for a Paywall that has two buttons
custom_steps: WHEN we pull up that particular paywall
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the button is properly centered on the Paywall

title: Audio [IAB-5291]: Verify that the Audio UI Navbar isn't highlighted in white when opening it up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Audio UI button
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Audio UI Navbar displays as black and isn't highlighted

title: MLB.TV (Data Syncing) [IAB-3455]: Verify that the Video Overlays continue to update at a reasonable rate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing an iOS 5.0+ Device
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we watch it for an extended period of time
custom_expected: THEN we will note that the Video Overlays will continue to update at a reasonable rate.

title: MLB.TV (Data Syncing) [IAB-5235]: Verify that the Matchup Overlay will not be removed after the game has ended
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to an MLB.TV Stream
AND we wait until a game has been completed
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the bottom overlay of "Matchup" will not be removed any longer

title: MLB.TV (Data Syncing) [IAB-5237]: Verify that Game States are not cutoff in the bottom overlay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Live MLB.TV Stream
AND the Game State on the bottom is present
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Game State is NOT cut off

title: MLB.TV (Box Score Overlay) [IAB-5252]: Verify that when we tap on a players name that the player card is showing the current logo for the team and not it's old logo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we bring up the Box Score overlay
AND we tap on a Players Name to bring up a Players Card
AND we repeat this for each MLB team
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the logos are correct for each team

title: Postseason [IAB-5251]: Verify that the Postseason Series selector buttons look crisp against Retina
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing a Retina Based Device
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look at the Postseason Series selector
AND we select each series
custom_expected: THEN the images being displayed on the selector are crisp

title: Postseason [IAB-5251]: Verify that the Postseason Series selector doesn't look blurry on non-Retina
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing a non-Retina Based Device
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we look at the Postseason Series selector
AND we select each series
custom_expected: THEN the images being displayed on the selector will NOT be blurry

title: Postseason [IAB-5255]: Verify that the currently selected series in the Series selector is a different color from the rest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we note the currently selected series at the top
AND we tap on the Series selector
AND we switch between each Series
custom_expected: THEN we will note that each series is properly highlighted in the Series selector when it has been selected

title: Postseason [IAB-5258]: Verify that "if necessary" games will show up with an asterisk and have a darker font color then non "if necessary" games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is currently enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we look through the various series
AND there are some "if necessary" games available
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the "if necessary" games have asterisks next to them
AND we will see that the "if necessary" games have a darker font color compared to games that are required

title: Postseason [IAB-5259]: Verify that on the "Division Series" and "League Championship Series" views that the selectors at the bottom use Team Short Codes instead of the Display Code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode has been enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we use the Series Selector to switch to the "Division Series"
OR we use the Series Selector to switch to the "League Championship Series"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the series selectors utilize the Team Short Codes (i.e. LAD, CWS, etc...) instead of the display codes (LAN, CHA, etc...)

title: Postseason [IAB-5260]: Verify that the number of games for each series are correct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled Postseason mode
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we move through each Series in the Series selector
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each series has the correct number of games

title: Postseason [IAB-5261]: Verify that the Game Number Label is not missing from any game in any series
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we switch between Series
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each series has all of it's games labels

title: Postseason [IAB-5265]: Verify that the Postseason view is not being incorrectly gated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Postseason enabled
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to access it without being gated

title: Postseason [IAB-5268]: Verify that the Postseason Menu is configurable to where it will not show for users that aren't utilizing at least 5.5
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have a device installed with a version lower then 5.5
AND we have another device installed with a version of 5.5 and/or greater
AND we have launched the Application on both
custom_steps: WHEN we take a look at the Menu
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Postseason Menu item will not appear for users under version 5.5
AND we will see that the Postseason Menu item will appear for users running at least 5.5

title: Postseason [IAB-5276]: Verify that any game that has a time of 3:33 AM will show as "TBD" instead of as 3:33 AM
custom_preconds:

AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is currently enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we look through the various series
custom_expected: THEN we will see anytime that is currently set to 3:33 AM displayed as "TBD"

AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is currently enabled
custom_steps:

title: Postseason [IAB-5287]: Verify that the series text for Wild Card games is along the line of "Game begins" instead of "Series begins"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we switch the series to "Wild Card"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see if it's the day of the game that the text will read as "Game begins today"
AND we will see if the game is under two days away that the text will read as "Game begins <Date Info>"

title: Postseason [IAB-5288]: Verify that if a user is using the "Default" Home Screen setting that it automatically opens to the Postseason view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND the Postseason Mode is currently enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we open the Application for the first time
OR we have set the "Default" Home Screen in settings
custom_expected: THEN the Postseason Screen will automatically open by default

title: Postseason [IAB-5290]: Verify that the Base Indicator isn't cut off at all in the Postseason View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason View
AND we have a game in progress available
AND we have a player on base
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that the Base Indicator looks good
AND that the Base Indicator is not cutoff at all

title: Postseason [IAB-5302]: Verify that we can set the default series on the Postseason View to each Series successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application

QA URL: http://qa.mlb.com/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml
custom_steps:
WHEN we change the <defaultSeriesId> to each series
AND we set the <defaultGameId> to a game that exists for a particular series
AND we do this for each series
AND we close down our Application between each of these changes
AND we reopen our Application
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to see that each series that we set will open up as default successfully

title: Postseason [IAB-5311]: Verify that we can successfully change the order of the games under each series
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled

QA URL: http://qa.mlb.com/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Menu
AND we change the <position> variable for games for a particular series in the configuration file
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the games for that particular series now reflect in the order of the <position> variable that has been set in the configuration files

title: Postseason [IAB-5313]: Verify that the Blurb Label for each Series will not overlap the Team vs. Team if we keep switching between various series
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason Tab
AND we switch between the various series multiple times in different orders
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see the Blurb Text overlap onto the Team vs. Team label

title: Postseason [IAB-5319]: Verify that the TV Station Logo's will only update when the image file is modified
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason view
AND we see the TV various TV logos present
AND we have an iOS Developer (i.e. like Alex Corrigan) upload a different logo for a TV Station
AND we leave the postseason view
AND we come back to the postseason view
Expected Result
custom_expected: THEN we will see the new logo that has been uploaded

AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Postseason Menu
AND we tap on the Free Trial Banner
custom_expected: THEN the Accessibility Label will be read correctly

title: Postseason [IAB-5337]: Verify that if we double tap on the Free Trial Banner with Accessibility enabled on the Postseason View that the Trial Flow will open up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Postseason Menu
AND we double tap on the Free Trial Banner
custom_expected: THEN the Free Trial flow will successfully open up

title: Settings [IAB-5254]: Verify that if we tap on a "Shop ad webview" that the Application will NOT crash when tapping on the "Done" button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a "Shop ad webview"
AND we tap it to open it up
AND we tap on the "Done" button to close it back done
custom_expected: THEN the Application will NOT crash

title: Trial [IAB-5182]: Verify that if we are a Lite user that we will see a thin "Sponsor Ad Banner" that will open up the "Ford Free App Trial" flow on the Postseason View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing the Application as a Lite User
AND Postseason Mode is enabled
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Postseason View
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a thin banner under the series selector 
AND the thin banner will be above the first series being displayed
AND the thin banner will be displaying the image located at the config value of: postseasonOfferImageUrl

title: Trial [IAB-5182]: Verify that we will see a thin "Sponsor Ad Banner" after we have signed up for the "Ford Free App Trial" this will differ from the original thin bar image that was there for the Postseason
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have the Postseason Mode enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Postseason View
AND we have logged into an account that has been signed up to the "Ford Free App Trial"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a Thin Ad Banner that will differ from the original Thin Ad Banner image and will match the config value of 'postseasonImageUrl' instead
AND we will see if we tap on it that it will open up an internal webview
